title: HiSuite
answer:
Your phone has the built-in HiSuite. 

 Open My Computer on the computer desktop and double-click the built-in disk to install HiSuite. 

 After connecting your phone to a computer using a USB cable, select PC Suite (HiSuite) on the USB connection methods screen. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110924)
